snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include theater owners worried that Google Glass might aid film piracy, the history behind Facebook’s new emoticons,...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include theater owners worried that Google Glass might aid film piracy, the history behind Facebook’s new emoticons, and how Bing Crosby and a German innovation from World War II helped foster the modern technological world.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Spy Drone and Revenge Pornography
